author: pderop
msg: Added new integration test which allows to ensure that required (but not instance bound dependencies)
are injected, even if the current state is INSTANTIATED_AND_WAITING_FOR_REQUIRED.

author: pderop
msg: Added more usecases in this test: autoconfig dependencies are also setup from init method, and
use two optional auto config dependencies as well as one required auto config dependency.

author: mamta
msg: DERBY-6361(Valid statements rejected if Derby has not implicitly created the current user's schema.)
